conbody.p: After the test suite execution, to view your test reports, go to the Reports folder in the Test Explorer panel.

Alternatively, you can also view your reports and details in <your-project-folder>/Reports. Katalon Studio supports exporting test reports into different formats, such as HTML, CSV, PDF, and JUnit. You can learn more about exporting reports here: Generate reports.

ul.li: For real-time monitoring and better reporting capabilities, consider integrating your project with Katalon TestOps. Learn more about test result reports here: Upload Test Results to Katalon TestOps from Katalon Studio.
